subject: Re: Perl can bind bash?
body:
On 6/6/07, jonatan perry  wrote:
> I would like to know if there is a way to BIND Perl and BASH, can someone
> suggest a good way?
> thanks
>    Jonatan Perry.
>

Get a good strong rope . . .

Oh, wait that probably isn't what you are talking about.  Can you
provide more information as to what you are trying to accomplish?

--
